kdl.prox.dbvis
Class GraphAsTree

java.lang.Object
  kdl.prox.dbvis.GraphAsTree

public class GraphAsTree
extends java.lang.Object

Helper 'view' of an arbitrary graph as a tree. Used to do BFS and to compute widths.

getHeight

public int getHeight()
Returns:
height in the sense of trees: maximium depth of a tree, where depth is # edges between a vertex and the root

getSuccessors

public java.util.List getSuccessors(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Vertex vertex)
Gets vertex's filtered successors. Assumes computeSuccessors() has been called.

Parameters:
vertex -
Returns:
my neighborhood, but filtered to not include cycles, loops, etc.

getWidth

public int getWidth(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Vertex vertex)
Parameters:
vertex -
Returns:
the width of vertex in my graph. returns 1 for leaves. width is defined for trees, and is the number of leaves taht are reachable from a given node
